message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.ST, cs.SY

The paper deals with a learning problem (multi-armed bandit) and optimization of an objective function (mean-variance) in the context of decision making systems. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The use of probability distributions (Gaussian and Bernoulli) and regret analysis indicates that the paper may also be relevant to the Statistics (cs.ST) and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. Finally, the focus on decision making systems and risk suggests that the paper may be relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
